CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 26, 1960, pg. 3 reads: "Capping Ceremony - Smiling prettily are three of the 92 young women participating in capping ceremony last Friday night at the Allegheny General Hospital School of Nursing. They are members of the class of 1962.  Left to right: Marilyn Hill, Carol Ann Watson and Ruth Elizabeth Banks.  Miss Banks is president of the class. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Marilyn Hill, Carol Ann Watson, and Ruth Elizabeth Banks, wearing light colored uniform jumpers and nurse's caps, standing in interior with diamond patterned curtains, horizontal format
